events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because the product is not what I expected.
The reported issue has been classified under the refund category due to customer's request for money back.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle this customer's case regarding incorrect product delivery.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received product so we can verify the issue quickly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I’ve attached a clear photo of the product showing it is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately, and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund offer. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been processed and the case is now resolved. Please check your account in a few days and reach out if there are any further issues.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund and to check if we can assist you with anything else.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for resolving this swiftly!
We have closed your case as the refund was completed successfully and your satisfaction confirmed.
